decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 3714/HH-01/JG Existing Ground Floor Plan, First Floor Plan & Loft Floor Plan, 3714/HH-02/JG Existing Elevations, 3714/HH-03/JG Proposed Ground Floor Plan, 3714/HH-04/JG Proposed First Floor Plan, 3714/HH-05/JG Proposed Loft Floor Plan, 3714/HH-06/JG Proposed Elevations, 3714/HH-07/JG Block plan, Location plan.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Conversion of garage into habitable space; insertion of a window in lieu of the garage door opening; front porch extension; single storey rear extension; first floor rear extension; alterations to rear ground floor fenestration involving replacement of windows with two windows and door ; rear roof extension (following demolition of dormer window)
